description: some features should be an app library (like in bottles) and theability to export commands to the host system
summary: Pretty nice but it still needs more features

description: It is really good at letting me open a specific terminal in a distrobox and managing them. However, it is more suited to isolated environments like the chroots and toolbxes. To the devs: You can make distroboxes more 'connected' to the host system. One way would be to list exported apps and to install and uninstall them.
summary: Great at managing distroboxes but could be more integrated
